titleStmt.title: The noble stranger As it was acted at the Private House in Salisbury Court, by her Maiesties Servants. The author, L.S.
titleStmt.author: L. S. (Lewis Sharpe), fl. 1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: By I[ohn] O[kes] for Iames Becket, and are to be sold at his shop at the Inner Temple gate, in Fleet-streete,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the Inner Temple gate, in Fleet-streete
